Title: Action/hopper.png
Info: There are square panels around you. You must jump on them and go up (foreground side). If you miss the panel and fall toward bottom, the game is over.

Title: Arcade/Lasers.png
Info: Lasers - A simple Ikaruga-like game.

Title: Arcade/chribocchi.png
Info: Chri-Bocchi Cat - A simple action game where move the cat and bounce gift boxes for 2 minutes.

Title: Action/Bangi.png
Info: Bangi is a classic arcade game where you must shoot and destroy each of the balloons that appear in each level.

Title: Action/Helii.png
Info: Helii is a port of my homebrew clone of the old Flash 'Helicopter Game' and its ilk (i.e. game type that Flappy Bird is a variation of). As you fly through the tunnel the gap becomes more narrow and more challenging - How far can you go?

Title: Action/Choplifter.png
Info: Rescue the hostages from behind enemy lines - but look out for the tanks that patrol the grounds! An Apple II remake!

Title: Action/Karatega.png
Info: Rescue Princess Mariko from within the Akum'a castle fortress.

Title: Misc/FestiveFight.png
Info: Holiday mascots from throughout the calendar must fight in order to compete for the affection of the children throughout the world for some weird reason.

Title: Arcade/Kungfuescape.png
Info: Enter the dragon! Battle enemies using an array of flying kicks, normal kicks and punches.

Title: Arcade/pocketfighter.png
Info: Pocket Fighter is an FTG, you can compete with your Arduboy. The CPU will repeat your actions at previous level.

Title: Arcade/bounce.png
Info: Air hockey for the Arduboy!  Two players pick their dogsand battle to the end.

Title: Arcade/ArduBoyng.png
Info: Pong. What more do you need to say?

Title: Action/To.png
Info: You are the developer of the door with the teleport function. But just before completion, someone is trying to destroy the door. There seems to be no choice but to distort the space with the power of the door and to prevent destruction.

Title: Arcade/BipBipBip.png
Info: A 'Pong' demake named 'Bip Bipbip' for two players. How to win? It is simple. If the ball touchs your opponent when he doesn’t press his button or if his rectangle reaches the middle of the screen before yours then he loses.

Title: Arcade/Pong.png
Info: One or two player version of the classic Pong.

Title: Arcade/ArduBreakout.png
Info: An Arduboy version of the classic game Breakout!

Title: Action/Breakout-v.png
Info: Simple breakout game for Arduboy. Vertical screen version.

Title: Arcade/Technomonkey.png
Info: A meteor crashes in a zoo during the night. An alien virus spreads to the residents in the zoo and causes them to mutate into robot hybrids called Technoids. Do to the outbreak the zoo has been under quarantine. It is a fight for survival inside. Can you beat the opposing Technoids and survive?

Title: Action/Quadrastic.png
Info: Quadrastic a simple addictive game based off a favorite psp homebrew game called Squarez.

Title: Arcade/SNAKE.png
Info: Snake - just like on the Nokia 5110 but on an Arduboy instead.

Title: Arcade/Snake2.png
Info: Snake - just like on the Nokia 5110 but on an Arduboy instead.

Title: Arcade/snake3.png
Info: Snake - just like on the Nokia 5110 but on an Arduboy instead.

Title: Arcade/MissSnake.png
Info: Snake - just like on the Nokia 5110 but on an Arduboy instead.

Title: Action/LodeRunner.png
Info: Collect all of the gold pieces without being touched by a guard then make your way to the top of the screen and to the next level. Stop guards by burning a hole in normal bricks so that they will fall in - revealing any gold they might be carrying.

Title: Action/thesocialdistancegame.png
Info: Get more points by keeping your distance from pedestrians and make your community proud. Ultimately, you should really be at home so at some point you’ll lose lol.

Title: Action/unicorn_dash.png
Info: An endless runner with .. well .. a unicorn!

Title: Action/Train Dodge.png
Info: Who’s brave enough to play chicken with a train? Stand on the track as multiple trains come at you full-speed.. The closer they get to you before jumping off the tracks, the more points you’ll rack up.

Title: Arcade/Digger.png
Info: Goal is to collect as many diamonds as needed to unlock the exit. You can move rocks, if there is nothing behind it. If a rock falls through a changer, then its converted to a diamond.

Title: Action/Crabator.png
Info: Crabator is an intense action game where you kill crabs to make money to buy weapons to kill crabs to make money, etc. but watch out, the more crabs you kill the more they are.

Title: Action/Harambes Revenge.png
Info: In Harambe’s Revenge, you play as a phantasmal Harambe that has returned from the afterlife to convert oblivious tourists into mutant zombie gorilla minions which will then protect him. The zoo had to close down in quarantine, trapping many tourists inside.

Title: Action/MallARDHunt.png
Info: Duck shooting on the Arduboy.

Title: Action/SuperSoldiers.png
Info: A dragon is attempting to conquer Canada by sending monsters after all of its cities. The military responds by sending its elite super soldiers powered by ancient gems to fight them.

Title: Action/WorldsHardestGame.png
Info: It lives up to its name .. man this is hard!

Title: Arcade/GarboylesQuest.png
Info: A remake of the CAPCOMM game of the same name.

Title: Action/Rooftops.png
Info: Rooftops is a game where you run on .. rooftops. It has 3D wireframe graphics. And the game is hard. You have 3 lives and NO way to restore them.

Title: Action/Bomberboy.png
Info: A remake of Bomberman.

Title: Action/BladeRunner.png
Info: Your task is to move from one platform to another through the constructed blade-bridge. If you get to the exact center of the bridge, you earn one coin. Perfect hit 5 times in a row gives +5 coins. At the hard level, these indicators double. Well, also you will find a small bonus in the store :)

Title: Action/Cotd.png
Info: Catacombs of the Damned! is a first person shooter / dungeon crawler where you navigate 10 floors of a randomly generated dungeon dispatching monsters with your magic fireballs whilst collecting as much loot as possible.

Title: arg/virus.png
Info: A virus turned your neighbours into Zombies but not all are infected. Find them .. quick!

Title: Action/Glove.png
Info: Glove is an action-adventure game created in the style of the classic Gauntlet series. Navigate from room to room, blasting bad guys and collecting treasure along the way

Title: Action/Mazogs.png
Info: A port of the 1982 game ‘Mazogs’ for the ZX81 adapted for the Arduboy

Title: Action/ArduIndy.png
Info: ArduIndy - Inspired by ZX Spectrum game 'Sabre Wulf'.

Title: Action/Raynetherogue.png
Info: As a child Rayne watched the rich from the streets of the village and burned with jealousy. After years and years of poverty an idea formed. Rayne has decided to sneak into the lairs of dragons and steel their treasures. Rayne need your help to navigate the dangerous caves and avoid the dragon’s breath to become the wealthiest person in the village - but take heed the further Rayne gets the more treacherous it will be!

Title: Action/RAYNE2.png
Info: After barely escaping the dragon’s lairs Rayne traveled the world in search for the next big adventure. Rayne came across a rumor of a magic lamp hidden within a castle. The lamp is guarded by vicious creatures hunting down any interlopers. Help Rayne navigate the castle and avoid the beasts to get the lamp.

Title: Action/zooatmidnight.png
Info: Scrawf must sneak around the zoo to collect the food ans feed the animals before and escaping - all without being caught in the flashlight beam of the zoo wardens!

Title: Arcade/CyberHack.png
Info: The corrupted Corpo has to be stopped and your hacking skills will be invaluable. Inspired by the game CyberPunk.

Title: Arcade/BeamEmUp.png
Info: You play a space squid that just wants to mess with some local cows. Move around the multi-screen landscape and use the A button to tractor beam the creatures and move them around the screen. Stopping the beam will let them go, but they’re pretty resilient.

Title: Arcade/RavineDespoiler.png
Info: Based on the Atari arcade game Canyon Bomber. You can speed up or slow down your plane and drop bombs in the canyon to knock out boulders for points. Missing rocks will result in losing points, while hitting multiple boulders at once gives extra points. The game is over when the canyon is emptied. I'm not sure what the theoretical high score is, but my best games have been around 240 with several misses.

Title: Arcade/SpaceCab.png
Info: A tribute to the classic Commodore 64 game Space Taxi! Collect and deliver customers to their destination as quickly as possible to make the most money! But be careful and make sure you do not run out of fuel land without deploying your landing gear or squash a customer.

Title: Action/rooftop.png
Info: Rescue the trapped people as fire consumes the city.

Title: Arcade/biribiribeat.png
Info: BiriBiriBeat is a rhythm game! Its title is derived from ビリビリ - a Japanese onomatopoeia used to describe an electric shock or vibration.

Title: Arcade/Backtothejungle.png
Info: The Zoo had to close, what can the animals do? A small arcade game, inspired slighty on frogger (but sideways).

Title: Arcade/Fatsche.png
Info: Defend the town from the marauders.

Title: Arcade/BurgardTime.png
Info: Peter Pepper  must walk over hamburger ingredients located across a maze of platforms while avoiding characters who pursue him.

Title: Arcade/Arduwhack.png
Info: Whack-a-Mole for the Arduboy!

Title: Arcade/JumpBoy.png
Info: Collect the coins but be carefull as the floorboards will decrease one by one each time you land on them.

Title: Arcade/JumpBoy2.png
Info: If you take 5 coins, the enemy will appear. The key will appear when you take 10 coins. Please take the key.

Title: Arcade/pooppanic.png
Info: Keep the Zoo clean of animal poop.

Title: Arcade/RoboDodge.png
Info: Control your very own small robot as you dodge the barrage of incoming rockets!

Title: Arcade/Chickenlauncher.png
Info: Shoot a chicken as far as you can. Try to hit springboards to give you a boost but watch out for spikes!

Title: Arcade/Dancerow.png
Info: An Audition Dance Game clone for Arduboy

Title: Arcade/keykat.png
Info: You are an I.T. worker named KeyKat. You must run around and turn computers off and back on again when they fail.

Title: Misc/DeepDishNine.png
Info: You have to pilot a spacecraft around the TRAPPIST-1 system (a recently discovered star with 7 earth-sized planets orbiting it) while delivering pizzas. The goal is to try to make it onto the high-score board by minimizing delivery time and fuel usage.

Title: Arcade/paqman.png
Info: Gamebuino port of the classic Pacman.

Title: Arcade/pactastic.png
Info: A cross between two classic games - PacMan and Snake.

Title: Arcade/2PlayersPack.png
Info: Multiple two player games including Pong, Trave, ReflX, Mill and Memo

Title: Arcade/Arduman.png
Info: Re-live the nostalgic glory of games like Pac-Man and Lock ‘n’ Chase (with a few less pixels…) right on your Arduboy!

Title: Arcade/Crateconfusion.png
Info: Manoeuvre the space ship to collect the crates.

Title: Arcade/oygd.png
Info: You have one job, 8 bombs, 16 seconds to get the key and get to the door .. alive!

Title: Action/Tinydepth.png
Info: Destroy the attacking submarines

Title: Puzzle/prizefrenzy.png
Info: Its holiday time and presents are falling from the sky. Catch as many as you can in the available time.

Title: Arcade/Jezzball.png
Info: The goal is to isolate bouncing balls by splitting the game area.

Title: Arcade/hollowseeker.png
Info: Go forward in right direction. Seek a hollow as refuge not to be crushed.

Title: Arcade/Chromedino.png
Info: A version of Chrome’s (in?)famous dino side-scroller running-man-style dino jumper.

Title: Arcade/SpookyGhostHalloweenDino.png
Info: A version of Chrome’s (in?)famous dino side-scroller running-man-style dino jumper but this time in a Halloween theme.

Title: Platformer/Squario.png
Info: Here is is the jumping square man adventure you’ve all been looking for! Jump over chasms! Jump on top of bad guys! Jump into Question blocks and get points! Points!!

Title: Arcade/Flappyball.png
Info: A flappy bird clone.

Title: Arcade/Flappybird.png
Info: A flappy bird clone.

Title: Action/ZooEscape.png
Info: The animals have escaped! Avoid the animals by jumping over them and landing on the crocodiles mouth to snap it shut.

Title: arg/ShadowRunner.png
Info: A shadow lost his kid by wandering too far away from the light. Now it must find its coloured equal to become one again.

Title: Arcade/Roorun.png
Info: The zoo had to close and now all the animals are trying to escape! Help the kangaroo run away from the animal control who’s trying to catch him.

Title: Arcade/Leannathelion.png
Info: Leanna may be a lion, but she knows what she likes: She wants fresh meat from her favorite restaurant.

Title: Arcade/ArduBuggy.png
Info: A moon patrol remake.

Title: Arcade/Fanboat.png
Info: Dodge gators on your propeller-powered pontoon as it rages faster and faster across the big black bayou. If you can pick up juice for your grandfather’s old shield generator, you can pass right through the congregation as long as it’s powered up

Title: Arcade/YouWontSurvive.png
Info: Avoid incoming enemies on two different modes and test your reflexes.

Title: Arcade/SFCave.png
Info: A remake of a palm pilot game.

Title: Action/FirePanic.png
Info: A remake of the classic Game and Watch game 'Fire'. Save the residents of the burning tower by catching them in your safety net and bouncing them into the awaiting ambulance before rushing them to hospital.

Title: Arcade/Kong.png
Info: A remake of the classic Game and Watch game Donkey Kong. Kong has stolen your lunch again. Avoid the barrels and topple the gorilla to retrieve it!

Title: Arcade/Kong2.png
Info: A remake of the classic Game and Watch game Donkey Kong II. Kong has been locked up but Kong Jnr can save him!

Title: Arcade/DKJr.png
Info: A remake of the classic Game and Watch game 'Donkey Kong Jr'.

Title: Arcade/Apara.png
Info: Catch the paratroopers jumping out of a helicopter before they fall in the water.

Title: Arcade/Parachute.png
Info: Catch the paratroopers jumping out of a helicopter before they fall in the water.

Title: Arcade/Vermuino.png
Info: A port of the Game and Watch game 'Vermin'.

Title: Arcade/Octopus.png
Info: A port of the Game and Watch game 'Octopus'.

Title: Arcade/Manhole.png
Info: You must save pedestrians from falling into manholes by covering them up. If one falls through, you will lose and will have to start over.

Title: Arcade/Manhole_KC.png
Info: You must save pedestrians from falling into manholes by covering them up. If one falls through, you will lose and will have to start over.

Title: Arcade/LionTamer.png
Info: Inspired by yet another Game and Watch - PPOT presents Lion Tamer. Someone has left the lion’s cage doors open! Keep them from escaping by blocking their path with your trusty chair. Play alone or with a second lion tamer!

Title: Arcade/OilPanic.png
Info: Inspired by yet another Game and Watch - PPOT presents Oil Panic. Catch all the oil before it sets the shop on fire!

Title: Arcade/Turtlebridge.png
Info: A remake of the classic Game and Watch game Turtle Bridge. Carry the package to the awaiting truck by jumping across the turtle’s backs. Watch out as they may dive for a snack!

Title: Platformer/TheCrawl.png
Info: The Crawl is a dungeon crawling platformer in which you have to find a path that allows you to discover enough keys to make it to the exit.

Title: Platformer/CastleBoy.png
Info: A Castlvania demake.

Title: Action/Sansan.png
Info: SanSan is a name of little Santa. A weapon is his bag! This is Son Son, Rygar inspired action game, but add some original ideas.

Title: arg/MysticBalloon.png
Info: Jump around, jump up and get down, jump around, float around, jump float, jump, float. Collect those coins.

Title: Misc/MidnightWild.png
Info: Something’s gone awry out West! Help Dusty Argile adventure out and defeat the baddies who are causing a commotion and stopping him from getting a good night’s rest. Put them to sleep with your handy lasso and rack up as many points as you can, but watch out for falling barrels, cacti, whirling tumbleweeds, snakes, and coyotes! Most of all, watch out for the mad bull and crazy Texan twister!

Title: Platformer/OmegaHorizon.png
Info: The planet of Turnax has extensive mineral deposits of high value to the Interplanetary Allied Confederation (IPAC). Recent unanticipated attacks by primative species have proven damaging to mining operations. Your mission is to eliminate the primitive hierarchy in minimal time.

Title: Platformer/SquareNose.png
Info: In a near future, in 1996, two international companies fight against each other to reign on the pet dry food market.So, what are you waiting for? Let’s go! Eat them all, Square Nose!

Title: Action/Jetpac.png
Info: You are an astronaut on an alien planet with a Jet Pac. Assemble you rocket and gather fuel before taking off.

Title: Arcade/joustish.png
Info: A game quite like Joust!

Title: Platformer/RickArduous.png
Info: Inspired by the retro-game Rick Dangerous, the player takes the role of an adventurer exploring caves in the hope of finding the Grail. The game propose a series of puzzles fitting in one screen. The player will have to reach the exit point of each screen to move to the next puzzle. The game propose 12 puzzle-screens with an increasing difficulty.

Title: Action/poitto.png
Info: An action puzzle game.

Title: arg/ecomd.png
Info: Obviously .. something went wrong. That's for sure! You are hired to fix it. No questions asked. Licensed to shoot all that moves!

Title: Platformer/supercrate.png
Info: A platform-action-shooting game.

Title: Platformer/ninjafuzz.png
Info: Guide the Fuzzgrawth up the three towers to collect the three ‘things’! It’s a fast paced platformer against the clock with randomly ordered levels.

Title: Platformer/bounce.png
Info: The Bounce is a bouncy ball physics platformer game. Simple to understand yet incredibly hard to master, what seems easy at first glance is actually pretty rage inducing when you get to the later levels.

Title: Platformer/BigBlackBox.png
Info: A port of the Gaebuino Big Black Box.

Title: Platformer/njahr.png
Info: A fast paced platformer.

Title: Puzzle/tinytower.png
Info: Players must climb up a procedurally generated tower.

Title: Platformer/Umeroose.png
Info: A game like Infinite Petit Petit. Addictive.

Title: Platformer/Tiny_Bert.png
Info: Move Bert between the squares by jumping about avoiding the bad guys.

Title: Platformer/OhMummy.png
Info: Heavily influenced by an Amsoft classic, attack advancing mummies and loot the pyramids.

Title: Misc/Ardulem.png
Info: Lemmings are cute, lovable animals, drifting through space, searching for their home world. Only you can save them!

Title: Platformer/platformer.png
Info: [WIP] It’s not much more than a few levels with a couple of different themes

Title: Arcade/microcity.png
Info: MicroCity is a city simulation game inspired by SimCity.

Title: Puzzle/microtd.png
Info: Defend your territory from the enemy attackers.

Title: Puzzle/Ardulem.png
Info: Lemmings on Arduboy!

Title: Arcade/ARtillery.png
Info: A remake of the classic Tanks game from the Amiga by Gary Roberts.

Title: Misc/Cascade Path.png
Info: Have you ever wanted to discover what life was like on the trail? Going hunting and fording rivers? Have you ever wanted to know more about dysentery than you could possibly imagine?

Title: Misc/lagunita.png
Info: A 1D wild west town builder game for Arduboy.

Title: Puzzle/waternet.png
Info: The aim of the game - in any game mode - is always to connect all pipes so that water can flow through them from the water point source. How you can accomplish this depends on the game mode. The game has a help section in the main menu where you can always check up on the rules of each game mode.

Title: Puzzle/CircuitDude.png
Info: Help Circuit Dude build an awesome invention by leading him through 75 unique levels, completing circuits and plugging in microchips. After all chips are inserted into their sockets, the exit will activate and you can advance to the next puzzle! What kind of secret invention is Circuit Dude building? Complete all of the levels to find out!

Title: Puzzle/Logix.png
Info: Logix is an educational game that teaches the basic logic gates used in digital electronics. Once you have completed some introductory puzzles that feature a single gate each, you can move on to harder puzzles that test your learning!

Title: Puzzle/Atomicpuzzlepack.png
Info: Three different puzzle games in one!

Title: Misc/Darkstar.png
Info: A little puzzle game based on the HP48 / TI83 calculator game Dstar.

Title: Puzzle/Sensitive.png
Info: A remake of the classic C64 game Sensitive by Oliver Kirwa.

Title: Puzzle/Blocks.png
Info: A puzzle game where you move boxes to where they belong.

Title: Puzzle/tinysokoban.png
Info: A clone of Sokoban (1982) using the Yoshio Murase Levels. These levels are very small but difficult and interesting.

Title: Puzzle/MAZEZAM.png
Info: The game is similar to Sokoban since the player is able to push (and not pull) boxes. One difference is that the boxes can only be pushed horizontally, and any push causes all of the boxes in that particular row to be moved. Another difference is that the player is only trying to exit the level as opposed to putting the boxes in the correct locations.

Title: Puzzle/chiemagari.png
Info: A puzzle game. Tere are 10 different pieces. You must place all of them into the frame without overlapping.

Title: Puzzle/Pipes.png
Info: A version of the classic pipes game where you must lay pipe between each pair of nodes without the pipes crossing each other. This version has puzzles ranging from 5 x 5 to 9 x 9.

Title: Misc/xmastree.png
Info: A Christmas themed version of the classic Towers of Hanoi game.

Title: Puzzle/AMaze.png
Info: Navigate through randomly generated mazes.

Title: Puzzle/Arduslide.png
Info: A tile slider game.

Title: Puzzle/Crates3d.png
Info: A port of the 3D puzzle game originally written for the TI-83 calculator.

Title: Puzzle/ringpuzzle.png
Info: A simple puzzle game with toroidal topology

Title: Puzzle/LiteOut.png
Info: Lite/Out is a game where you have to turn off all of the lights, but every time you change a light, the surrounding lights change. The game consists of a 5-by-5 grid where some of the blocks are lit up. You’ll complete the level when all of the blocks are not lit.

Title: Puzzle/ArduLO.png
Info: ArduLO is a Lights Out clone where you have to turn off all of the lights, but every time you change a light, the surrounding lights change. The game consists of a 5-by-5 grid where some of the blocks are lit up. You’ll complete the level when all of the blocks are not lit.

Title: Puzzle/2048.png
Info: The classic 2048 sliding tile puzzle.

Title: Puzzle/1010.png
Info: 1010! is a wildly addicting brain teaser - a simple puzzle game that will challenge you, while also training your brain. Put your puzzle skills to the test with this exciting title - we dare you to try and put it down.

Title: Puzzle/termtwirl.png
Info: This is clone of classic Text Twist, with 1900 random levels. Add to your score by unjumbling the letters to make words. If you use all six letters to make a word within the allotted time, then you can continue to the next level. There is a large bonus for finding all the words before time runs out.

Title: Puzzle/LongCat.png
Info: A puzzle game inspired in the longcat minigame from the Fancade Android game.

Title: Puzzle/TinyTris.png
Info: A falling-block game sort of like Tetris.

Title: Puzzle/Tris.png
Info: Another falling-block game sort of like Tetris, but not copyrighted.

Title: Puzzle/TwoTris.png
Info: Another falling-block game sort of like Tetris but for two players.

Title: Puzzle/SantasHappyLittlePacker.png
Info: Santa needs help, he has a lot of gifts and you need to fit them in his sleigh filling all the spaces.

Title: Puzzle/ArduGods.png
Info: Your goal in this game is to gather faith and a cult following to become stronger and be able to battle the rest of the Gods, to reclaim your place among them as the most powerful ever, and it all starts by raising prayers with your Arduboy buttons.

Title: Misc/Hangman.png
Info: Classic hangman game with nearly 800 words.

Title: Puzzle/ButtonsTrail.png
Info: This great little puzzle game was written by Wan Sou.

Title: Puzzle/PawnPath.png
Info: This great little puzzle game was written by Wan Sou.

Title: Puzzle/FloorFall.png
Info: This great little puzzle game was written by Wan Sou.

Title: category-screens/ppot/LeWord.png
Info: The NY Times classic word game in English and French.

Title: Puzzle/single_ennead.png
Info: This is a demake of the Triple Triad trading card game from the Final Fantasy franchise. In this clone, there are 100 cards to collect, each with different art and flavor text.

Title: Puzzle/FrankenMacCharDeeDen.png
Info: FrankenMacCharDeeDen (AKA CharDee MacDennis) is a 2-player head-to-head trivia game based on the satirical comedy, It’s Always Sunny In Philadelphia. Each player holds the Arduboy together, player one hovers over the LEFT button, player two over the B button, when a question is shown, press your button before the other to get a chance to answer it!

Title: Puzzle/curse.png
Info: The evil Astarok has cast a nasty curse on the folk of Griford and turned them into pumpkins! The town’s people have asked you to battle the AstaroK and his evil friends in their hideout - an old castle on the edge of town. Can you release the town from the curse of AztaroK?

Title: Puzzle/Astarok.png
Info: Each year the people of the village choose a new champion to protect them from Astarok. Compete in the trials to see how far you can get and you could be that champion! Your choice of runes will select different courses … some are easier than others!

Title: Puzzle/knightmove.png
Info: An action-puzzle game where you control a knight piece of the chess which can move in an L shape on the 8×4 board.

Title: Arcade/Samegame.png
Info: A famous tile-matching puzzle.

Title: Puzzle/stairssweep.png
Info: A falling block puzzle game.

Title: Puzzle/psicolo.png
Info: A puzzle game with dice.

Title: Puzzle/Minesweeper.png
Info: The classic Minesweeper for the Arduboy.

Title: Puzzle/Ardusweeper.png
Info: The classic Minesweeper for the Arduboy with three levels of difficulty: easy (15 mines), medium (25) and hard (35).

Title: Puzzle/CatMines_v1.png
Info: Cat Mines is a Minesweeper clone. The objective is to successfully mark all the mines (or cats) on the grid in the shortest amount of time possible. If you accidentally reveal a mine, the game ends. The game has three different difficulty levels, each with a different number of mines on the grid. Once you have won or lost, your time will be shown.

Title: arg/begemmed.png
Info: Get three or more matching gems in a row by swapping adjacent gems.

Title: arg/Blobattack.png
Info: A falling block game.

Title: Puzzle/sudoku.png
Info: Play Sudoku on your Arduboy. Includes 45 puzzles (easy, medium, hard) and allows custom puzzles to be entered manually or via serial input.

Title: Puzzle/Boxstacker.png
Info: Stacker clone like the game at the arcade that gives you a chance to win a prize, however in this one the only thing you win is satisfaction!.

Title: Puzzle/Arduboysays.png
Info: Simon for the Arduboy. Remember and repeat the sequences as they show on screen.

Title: Puzzle/Nomis.png
Info: A simple memory game similar to Simon.

Title: Puzzle/I Do U DO.png
Info: A simple memory game similar to Simon.

Title: Puzzle/Cutie_E.png
Info: Dance Dance Revolution anyone?

Title: Arcade/diamonds.png
Info: Diamonds is a mix between a breakout game and a puzzle game. Original game was released on HP48 more than 20 years ago.

Title: Puzzle/KOOKY.png
Info: Santa has delivered the presents and filled the stockings. Help Santa eat the cookies before the kids wake up and discover him in this match 2 puzzle game. Build bigger sets to get extra time and lots of points.

Title: Puzzle/NumberMind.png
Info: NumberMind - A Master Mind type game with numbers

Title: Puzzle/Bombzzle.png
Info: An explosive puzzle game!

Title: Puzzle/Floodfill.png
Info: This is a simple flood fill game for the Arduboy. Starting from the top-left tile, the goal is to flood the entire board until there is only one pattern. There are 999 levels. Each level has a limit of 20 moves.

Title: Puzzle/Tres.png
Info: A Threes! clone.

Title: Puzzle/Roshambo.png
Info: Paper, rock, scissors for the Arduboy.

Title: Puzzle/TicTacCurly.png
Info: Tic Tac Toe by Curly.

Title: Puzzle/Zoo.png
Info: A beautiful begemmed style of game.

Title: Puzzle/santasfactory.png
Info: In Santa’s Factory, there’s no room for one mistake. Your job is to deliver each present to the correct place.

Title: Puzzle/tntank.png
Info: Avoid the TNT in this Minesweeper style game.

Title: Puzzle/NBOTK.png
Info: There is a new falling block game in town.

Title: Misc/RickAndMortyGame.png
Info: Here is THE MOST EPIC (unofficial) ARDUBOY RICK AND MORTY game.

Title: Puzzle/TinyDDUG.png
Info: Control Dig Dug to defeat all enemies per stage, by either inflating them to bursting or crushing them underneath rocks.

Title: Puzzle/Tiny_Morpion.png
Info: The best Tic Tac Toe version available for the Arduboy!

Title: Puzzle/Picross.png
Info: Classic PiCross game with over 150 levels!

Title: Puzzle/Arducross.png
Info: Classic PiCross game with over 16 levels ranging in size from 3x3 to 15x15.

Title: Puzzle/HUD.png
Info: Apollo is a Lunar Lander Clone.

Title: Misc/Arduchess.png
Info: Play chess on the Arduboy!

Title: Misc/Blackjack.png
Info: The classic casino game. This implementation plays a ‘unified’ version of the various BlackJack games from different casinos around the world. It allows splits, double up and insurance on a dealer blackjack and so forth.

Title: arg/Diceoffate.png
Info: A dice utility. Choose between a coin or a 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 20 or 100 sided dice.

Title: Puzzle/reversi.png
Info: Reversi is a strategy board game for two players, played on an 8×8 uncheckered board.

Title: Puzzle/quarto.png
Info: An abstract strategy board game played on a 4x4 board with 16 unique pieces.

Title: Demos/littlerookchess.png
Info: Chess, obviously.

Title: Puzzle/Farkle.png
Info: A dice game of tactics and luck.

Title: Puzzle/MicroCheckers.png
Info: The classic Chinese game of checkers.

Title: Puzzle/Whist.png
Info: German Whist is an adaptation of classic Whist for two players. There is nothing German about it - as far as anyone can tell it is of British origin.

Title: Puzzle/Cribbage.png
Info: Classic English game of Cribbage - a luck and tactics card game.

Title: Puzzle/Pocketothello.png
Info: Classic Othello game for the Arduboy!

Title: Puzzle/Dominoes.png
Info: All Fives is a popular variant of Dominoes where players the goal of the game is not just to go out, but to make the open ends of the layout add up to 5 (or a multiple of five). One or two players.

Title: Puzzle/Yatzy.png
Info: A dice game where you need to role combinations before running out of attempts.

Title: Puzzle/Cripplemronion.png
Info: A hilariously complicated combination of poker and blackjack, using an 8-suited deck.You can customize your character, accumulate money through betting, etc. As you gain money, your ‘rank’ increases, with the ultimate goal of being rich enough to become the Patrician of Ankh-Morpork!

Title: Misc/Solitaire.png
Info: This is a Klondike solitaire game for the Arduboy. It includes two difficulties (turning one or three cards at a time) and the ability to undo moves.

Title: Misc/chess.png
Info: A simple chess game.

Title: Racing/Arddriving.png
Info: A fast paced racing sim.

Title: Racing/ArduRacer.png
Info: A top down racing time trail racing game for the ArduBoy similar to Trackmania

Title: Racing/RoadTrip.png
Info: Inspired by the Atari 2600 game Enduro. Strap on your goggles. Sink into your seat. And leave all your fears in the pit. You’re about to enter the race of your life. You’ll be required to pass lots of cars each day. From sunrise to sunset - as fast as you can. Welcome to the National Enduro!

Title: Racing/BoneShakers.png
Info: Bone Shakers is a racing game where skeletons ride unicycles around a dungeon race track. In part inspired by Super Mario Kart for the SNES.

Title: Racing/CrazyKart.png
Info: Mario Kart for the Arduboy.

Title: Racing/Randocity.png
Info: Arduboy large open-world procedurally generated city motorcycle game with 3 play modes.

Title: Racing/tinybike.png
Info: Compete in races on your BMX.

Title: Racing/Ufo-Race.png
Info: One single race. One single goal. Finish the lap as fast as possible, you're running against the clock!

Title: RPG/ardurogue.png
Info: ArduRogue: a traditional roguelike for the Arduboy.

Title: RPG/ardynia.png
Info: Ardynia - a Zelda style adventure.

Title: RPG/darkandunder.png
Info: A dungeon crawler for the Arduboy.

Title: RPG/Arduventure.png
Info: Arduventure is a classic top-down 8-Bit RPG with original monochrome graphics and musical score. Collect items, weapons, armor, amulets and magic to fight enemies in turn-based battle system. Explore a massive world map larger than the one in Zelda: Links Awakening!

Title: RPG/starhonor.png
Info: Star Honor is a Roguelike space adventure where you are field promoted into the Captain’s chair of the USS Arduino. Your home world has become the victim of the a biological weapon deployed by enemies. You posses the only hope for your world, a cure for the phage. With a skeleton crew, a limping vessel and time running out, you must travel world to world, seeking supplies, upgrades and doing battle to make it home and save your planet.

Title: Arcade/tacklebox.png
Info: Similar to the classic Legend of the River King, Tackle Box is a fishing-themed role playing video game.

Title: RPG/MiniRogue.png
Info: Mini Rogue is a 9-card game in which a single player delves into a deep dungeon to get the famous ruby called The Og’s Blood on the bottom floor. The player must choose how to spend their resources in order to be powerful enough to confront ever difficult monsters. Random events and encounters make every play-through a unique experience.

Title: RPG/underthetower.png
Info: n a dying city, cut off from the world due to plague, The Tower stands above its center. While the rich and powerful gather in the tower, safe from the devastation below, those below are not so lucky. Among the trash on mud flats by the river, scavengers seek to find anything valuable. They are known as Mudlarks. This is the tale of one of the many unfortunate souls that lives…

Title: RPG/TowerOfPain.png
Info: Tower Of Pain is a small roguelike game with simplified mechanics and small assets (very small assets).. made for fun only!!

Title: RPG/Arduminer.png
Info: Mining, crafting and combat on your arduboy. Explore 64 procedurally generated levels, conquer dungeons and upgrade your kit to survive progressively stronger enemies.

Title: RPG/HelloCommander.png
Info: 'Hello, Commander' is a Turn-Based Strategy game for the Arduboy.

Title: RPG/Rogue.png
Info: Rogue-like ascii based adventure for the Arduboy

Title: RPG/shatteredlands.png
Info: Shattered Lands - a multi-part RPG saga for Arduboy.

Title: arg/Fantasy.png
Info: A two-player card battle game.

Title: Misc/tamaguino.png
Info: Tamagotchi for the Arduboy.

Title: RPG/tqft.png
Info: A platformer game with elements of RPG and puzzle-solving challenges.

Title: RPG/Monpals.png
Info: Monpals is a rpg that is much like Pokemon and Monster Rancher. There are 15 total monsters in the game that have one of three types: Nature, Mystic, Synth.

Title: RPG/MayQ.png
Info: Explore the dungeon and battle the monsters and bats.

Title: Shooter/Do You Remember Love.png
Info: A space shoot 'em up where the attackers come rom all angles.

Title: Shooter/Petit of the dead.png
Info: Shoot the zombies before they catch you.

Title: Shooter/galaxian.png
Info: The classic NAMCO game!

Title: Shooter/Starduino.png
Info: Starduino - Star Fox inspired 3D rail shooter for Arduboy.

Title: Shooter/starduino-turbo.png
Info: Starduino - Star Fox inspired 3D rail shooter for Arduboy.

Title: Arcade/microtank.png
Info: You start with a small tank and your goal is to get as deep as possilbe into enemy territory. Some enemys drop coins for upgrading the weapon of your choice.

Title: Shooter/1nvader.png
Info: 1NVADER is a one or two-player game played with one button, one laser, one 1NVADER, and one life. Play co-operatively, or competitively with a friend, or face the 1NVADER alone.

Title: category-screens/ppot/OBS.png
Info: Youe ship has been damaged by some space debris. The steering is broken and you cannot navigate. You discover that by firing the laser you can steer ..sort of! Avoid the asteroids and enemy ships and fly home.

Title: Arcade/1944.png
Info: A remake of the classic CapCom game 1944 The Battle of Midway.

Title: arg/Sirene.png
Info: There's trouble under the sea, but Nina will fight her way to the heart of it. An aquatic shoot-em-up adventure!

Title: Action/Junofirst.png
Info: Kill each wave of attacking aliens before you fuel or health runs out. Rescue the captured astronaut to get extra points!

Title: Arcade/Evade.png
Info: Side scrolling space shooter.

Title: Arcade/Evade2.png
Info: A space flight / fight simulator.

Title: Shooter/ardubullets.png
Info: Avoid voluminous bullets and defeat enemy squadron in one minute.

Title: Shooter/StellarImpact.png
Info: A space shoot 'em up with procedurally generated starfields. Watch for the bomb that freezes time!

Title: Action/Trenchrun.png
Info: Inspired by the Star Wars Battle Pod Arcade Game. It depicts the rebels assault on the Doom Sphere, the Empire enormous space station and you, as a Rebel pilot, have to destroy the Imperial Fighters until you get a chance to shoot into the Exhaustion Port and destroy it.

Title: Shooter/TinyAsteroids.png
Info: An Asteroids (1979) clone.

Title: Shooter/l4arduboy.png
Info: i4arduboy is a horizontal shmup. Control a submarine and snipe far enemies on off-screen with torpedos!

Title: Arcade/Loverush.png
Info: A cute infinite shooter for Arduboy.

Title: arg/trollyfish.png
Info: Little fish. Big fish, swimming in the water. Com back here, man. Give me back my star!

Title: Shooter/NightRaid.png
Info: It’s extremely similar to Missile Command.

Title: Shooter/Arcodia.png
Info: A port of the classic ZX Spectrum game ‘Arcadia’.

Title: Shooter/SuitShooter.png
Info: Launch suits of cards at falling cards in order to create matches and score points. Watch out, though! Missing cards will hurt you! The cards start out falling slowly, but get faster as you score more points and regain health.

Title: Arcade/Millipe.png
Info: A small Centipede clone.

Title: Shooter/CosmicPods.png
Info: CosmicPods is a tiny shoot-'em-up game. You are a cosmic squid, shoot octopuses up!

Title: Shooter/BattleForZ.png
Info: A space shoot 'em up!

Title: Shooter/SpaceFighter.png
Info: A space shooter similar to Stellar Impact.

Title: Shooter/SpaceKnife.png
Info: A Gradius type of side-scroller shmup.

Title: Puzzle/spacequarth.png
Info: A space shoot 'em up.

Title: Shooter/CowBro.png
Info: You are a cowboy and have to shoot randomly generated targets and grab time bonuses that drop from the top of the stage to continue.

Title: Shooter/TinyDigitalInvader.png
Info: Tiny Digital Invader is Casio MG-880 Calculator(1980) game clone. This game use only 8 * 7-segment display.

Title: Shooter/101Starships.png
Info: A horizontal space shoot 'em up.

Title: Shooter/KemonoPatrol.png
Info: A moon buggy-style game.

Title: Shooter/TinyPlaque.png
Info: Protect your host's teeth from plaque in this littl shmup.

Title: Action/Siege.png
Info: The king needs your help to keep the Dark Lord’s army from destroying the kingdom. The Wizards will arrive after the 5th day and the rest of our army will be back in 20 days. The king is counting on you to hold the wall. Hold strong, noble archer, HOLD STRONG!

Title: Shooter/cooties.png
Info: An entry into the itch.io Game Jam, Cooties Attack is a shoot 'em up where you have to kill everyone's childhood fear (cooties!).

Title: Shooter/asteroids.png
Info: A remake of the classic, multi-directional shooter.

Title: Shooter/Tiny-Missile.png
Info: Shoot the incoming missiles before they kill you.

Title: Shooter/SpaceInvaders.png
Info: A remake of the classic Space Invaders.

Title: Shooter/SFZ.png
Info: Avoid the enemies as they fly, bounce or roll towards you. Beautifully made!

Title: Shooter/Pyoro_1.1.png
Info: In Pyoro (known as Bird and Beans in the US) you must destroy the incoming enemies before they destroy your platform.

Title: Shooter/orbs.png
Info: Orbs is losely based on the concept of the PC game Osmos. The user owns an orb that is to capture the other orbs in its universe. The user’s orb is distinguished by sparkles blinking inside of the orb. To win, all other Orbs are to be captured.

Title: Shooter/Armageddon.png
Info: You have been tasked with the defense of six cities from the incoming nuclear apocalypse. You have only two launchers to shoot down incoming missiles.  Survive as long as you can to delay the inevitable end of the world.

Title: Shooter/invadersyoda.png
Info: Classic Space Invaders clone.

Title: Shooter/picovaders.png
Info: Picovaders is a space invaders-like shooting game for Arduboy.

Title: Shooter/mega_missiles.png
Info: It’s pretty simple but it’s fun. You use the left and right arrows to move and A or B to shoot. Get to 10 points before the enemy gets you.

Title: Sports/ardugolf.png
Info: 18-hole Mini Golf game with stunning vector graphics!

Title: Sports/SkateArdDie.png
Info: Skateboarding on the Arduboy.

Title: Sports/Ardletics.png
Info: Ardletics - Athletics for Arduboy

Title: Arcade/Borisgoesskiing.png
Info: Boris Goes Skiing is a clone of the ZX Spectrum game Horace goes skiing.

Title: Arcade/ArduBall.png
Info: Basketball for the Arduboy.

Title: Sports/tinytrick.png
Info: Icehockey for the Arduboy.

Title: Sports/arduturfmasters.png
Info: Golf on the Arduboy!

Title: Sports/Electronic Quarterback.png
Info: The short instructions are you select pass or run. On a run play just try to run forward using your 2 blockers to help you. On a pass you are moving your lower dot downfield try to line him up with your QB and press A to pass. When the play’s over you press B to see the down & distance, and press it a second time to see the score and time. We’re short a button so if you hold B and press A it switches the play call from run to pass. This is indicated in the upper right of the screen.

Title: Misc/abSynthFM.png
Info: FM Synthesizer with 16-step sequencer for Arduboy.

Title: Application/musicgenpocket.png
Info: MusicGenN Pocket is 8bit mugic generator for Arduboy. All you have to do is turn on your Arduboy and you can listen 8bit music everywhere!

Title: Application/ArduMetronome.png
Info: Use it when practicing a musical instrument (except for maybe a drum set, it probably isn’t loud enough for that), or turn it on and hide it somewhere to annoy your family, friends and loved ones with incessant beeps.

Title: Misc/nanoseq.png
Info: A nano sized sequencer for Arduboy.

Title: Misc/petitseq.png
Info: Petitseq - petit size sequencer for Arduboy.

Title: Misc/arduloop.png
Info: Produce interesting chiptune-ish loops on the internal beeper.

Title: Multi/3in1A.png
Info: Three games in one - Space Invaders, Pinball and Pacman.

Title: Multi/3in1B.png
Info: Three games in one - Tiny Bomber, Tiny Arkanoid, Tiny Gilbert.

Title: Multi/3in1C.png
Info: Three games in one - Tiny Bert, Tiny Bike, Tiny Trick.

Title: Multi/3in1D.png
Info: Three games in one - Tiny DDug, Tiny Plaque, Tiny Tris.

Title: Multi/3in1E.png
Info: Three games in one - Tiny Missile, Tiny Morpion, Tiny Pipe

Title: Multi/Epic Mini Games.png
Info: Four games in one - Meterorites, Race, Runner, Whack a Mole

Title: Multi/LATE.png
Info: Three games in one - Tetris, Blocks Puzzle (1010 clone), Bridge Builder (Stick Hero)

Title: Application/eggmaster.png
Info: Here is the Egg Master Pro 2020. To be taken with a grain of salt. Hope you like it!

Title: Application/ArduboyGamepad.png
Info: Arduboy Gamepad allows you to map your Arduboy’s buttons to keyboard keys.

Title: Application/VirtualGamepad.png
Info: Virtual Gamepad allows you to map your Arduboy’s buttons to keyboard keys.

Title: Application/Graph.png
Info: A small graphing calculator for Arduboy! Very simple, though. More of a novelty than an actual calculator.

Title: Application/graph2.png
Info: A fully-functional graphing calculator! It’s ten times better than Graph 1, because you can enter your own expression from scratch!

Title: Application/ArduSaver.png
Info: Do you feel your OLED is suffering from critical levels of burn-in? Is nostalgia spoiling your working day? ArduSaver to the rescue!

Title: Demos/screensaver.png
Info: A screen saver of fascinating shapes.

Title: Application/GolfCompanion.png
Info: The Golf Companion for the Arduboy. Keep scores for up to 4 players.

Title: Misc/ArduboyLife.png
Info: Arduboy gets a Life (Conway’s Game of Life)

Title: Demos/gameoflife.png
Info: Game of Life (Celluar Automaton) for Arduboy.

Title: Misc/silence-a-text-adventure.png
Info: A fun little Sci-Fi text adventure using the GTI game engine

Title: Demos/fidget.png
Info: Stop fidgeting! A fidget spinner for the Arduboy!

Discription: Book Reader - The Pig And The Box
Title: Application/book.png
Info: A portable book reader that creates executable books. It compresses the text but still because of the limited flash size only small books will fit.

Title: Misc/tgwnc.png
Info: This is an ebook reader for the Arduboy. About 15 minutes of reading with 32 small and funny chapters.

Title: Application/ArduboyLightMeter.png
Info: I’m not sure if this falls under useful or useless. I’ll let others be the judge. It’s definitely useless in the emulator. You’ll have to load it into a real Arduboy.

Title: Application/arduEZ.png
Info: The Ardu-EZ button is the perfect way to relish your daily successes! Just one press and you’ll be greeted with a satisfying reminder of the ease with which you dispatch even the most pesky problems. But a veteran problem-solver like you won’t need only one press, so the Ardu-EZ button is built to withstand rapid dispensing of self-validation. And no matter how many quandaries you navigate, the Ardu-EZ button will keep a satisfying tally of each victory.

Title: Application/OktaArduToken.png
Info: An Okta one-time password token.

Title: Application/ArduRemote.png
Info: Use your Arduboy as a remote keyboard / mouse.

Title: Application/sketch.png
Info: An etch-a-sketch for the Arduboy.

Title: Application/ardubrain.png
Info: ArduBrain is an application that helps you keeping your brain sharp training your reflexes, memory, focus and much more!

Title: Application/CreditCard.png
Info: Save your Credit Card information inside your Credit Card sized gaming system.

Title: Application/Calendar.png
Info: A calendar for the Arduboy. Make notes on important days.

Title: Application/hp35.png
Info: HP35boy is a HP35 Emulator for Arduboy. The HP-35 was Hewlett-Packard's first pocket calculator and the world's first scientific pocket calculator: a calculator with trigonometric and exponential functions.

Title: Application/TVTuner.png
Info:
Software defined NTSC TV tuner.
Features :
* Demodulation of VHF bands
* 4:3 aspect ratio
* Interlace video
* 3 volume settings
* Auxiliary input
* Requires an antenna

Discription: PI 24K - a browser of the Circular Constant
Title: Application/pi24k.png
Info: You can see 24,576 digits of circular constant. You may enjoy the mysterious melody and perform of light generated from the digit sequence.

Title: Application/LoveTester.png
Info: A homage to the strange mind of Gunpei Yokoi. Testing requires two people - one person must hold the left directional button while the other person must hold the right directional button. The buttons must be held for 5 seconds, during which time the needle will fluctuate. After 5 seconds the needle will stop, indicating its final reading.

Title: Application/Magic8Ball.png
Info: The magi 8 arduball is a very simple program based on the original Magic 8 Ball. Just ask something and the arduino will predict the better answer for your question.

Title: Application/Chirp.png
Info: Make someone go crazy with your Arduboy. Just hide it, he will briefly chirp every 1 to 15 minutes.

Title: Application/sandbox.png
Info: It’s a sandbox simulator inspired by those old browser falling sand games.

Title: Application/pipboy32u4.png
Info: This game is not a game at all, but in fact a program that turns your Arduboy into a functional Pip-boy! Performs inventory management, bad USB attacks and has a mpa of Houston and some music to keep you busy.

Title: Application/ivboy.png
Info: IVBOY - A powerful FORTH-like programable scientific RPN calculator for the Arduboy

Title: Application/cistercia.png
Info: Explore the number system used by Cistercian monks in the 13th through the 15th century particularly. The concept is that by compounding certain numerals together you could represent higher numbers, on a line with with units, tens, hundreds, and thousands being different quadrants (With a vertical line in the middle representing zero, the area to the top right of the line is your units, the top left your tens, bottom right your hundreds, and bottom left your thousands) thus there need only be separate symbols for 1,2,3,4, and 6, because 5,7,8, and 9 can be represented by a combination of the other characters, placed atop each other.

Title: Application/Ardutosh.png
Info: Ardutosh is an OS / desktop environment for the Arduboy. The style is inspired by the classic Macintosh interface. It has the following features: Serial terminal, Remote app, Notes text editor, EEPROM hex editor, Battery voltage monitor, Internal temperature monitor, LED tester

Title: Application/Abshell.png
Info: Abshell is a command shell for Arduboy. You can send commands from PC to Arduboy via USB-serial port. No programming skills needed to draw graphics on Arduboy screen! Any VT100 compatible serial port terminal softwares (PuTTY, etc.) can be used.

Title: Application/Toolbox.png
Info: A toolbox of tools for developing ArduboyTones compatible music and Sprites compatible images. The toolbox permits you to save the progress of your creations in EEPROM allowing you to complete your masterpieces over a number of sessions. Once complete, the output can be downloaded using a serial monitor (like that shipped with the Arduino IDE) in a format you can then paste directly into an Arduboy sketch.

Title: Application/ABAsmDP1.png
Info: ABasm is an Arduboy game that lets you program your own Arduboy games, on your Arduboy! It uses an assembly language-style of programming with its own bytecode format.

Title: Application/ArduboyAssistant.png
Info: Arduboy Assistant is a program that allows you to manage an Arduboy’s EEPROM as well as test several hardware and software components.

Title: Application/ASE.png
Info: ASE - a sprite editor for Arduboy games that runs on the Arduboy.

Title: Application/PocketPDA.png
Info: Pocket PDA - an OS turns your Arduboy into a PDA.

Title: Application/brainfxck.png
Info: An interactive Brainf#ck interpreter

Title: Application/SetSystemEEPROM.png
Info: A utiloity that allows you to set the 'Unit Name' of your Arduboy.  This is displayed at the end of the logo sequence and can be used in programs to uniquely identify the unit.

Title: Application/EEPROMEditor.png
Info: Inspired by Crait’s Arduboy Assistant, this version has been expanded to show 25 bytes at a time (to give context) with the current cell highlighted in the middle.

Title: Application/welcome.png
Info: Instructions on how to drive your new FX. This is the default application the FX comes pre-installed with.
